alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Franklin; Sebastian (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 02 at 5:23AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Franklin, Crawford, northern Sebastian, eastern Sequoyah and northeastern Le Flore Counties through 615 AM CDT... At 522 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 2 miles north of Gans to 4 miles south of Hackett. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Fort Smith... Van Buren... Charleston... Cedarville... Natural Dam... Greenwood... Alma... Barling... Pocola... Muldrow... Roland... Lavaca... Arkoma... Mulberry... Dyer... Hackett... Bonanza... Moffett... Rudy... Lee Creek... This includes the following highways, Interstate 40 in Arkansas between mile markers 0 and 19. Interstate 40 in Oklahoma between mile markers 314 and 328. Interstate 540 between mile markers 1 and 14. Interstate 49 between mile markers 22 and 28. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
